name: Astrodog
description:
Astrodog the heroic space dog is on a mission to give four friends a helping paw to find their musical instruments.

Since the Astrodog cannot rely on his nose in space, he must follow his ears to fulfill the quest. On his journey to the finite immensity, he must collect bones to keep up his pace.

Commands:
Arrows: turn & move
Space: grab or drop items

Best enjoyed with a headset!
